tool_description: Monitors health and performance metrics of deployed services with alerting capabilities.

service_name.description: Name of the service to monitor

kubeconfig.description: Base64 encoded kubeconfig for cluster access

error_messages: Service not found: Specified service does not exist in namespace.
Health endpoint unreachable: Cannot access health check endpoint.
Metrics endpoint unreachable: Cannot access metrics endpoint.
Invalid check interval: Must be between 10-3600 seconds.
Invalid threshold format: Use METRIC=VALUE format (e.g., cpu=80, memory=90).
Kubeconfig authentication failed: Verify kubeconfig credentials.
usage: Provide service_name, namespace, and kubeconfig. Optionally configure health_endpoint, metrics_endpoint, check_interval, and alert_thresholds.

health_status.description: Current health status of the service
